entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Penticton Airport 03:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 3.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.0°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to 700 metres after midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:35 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Snow level 700 metres rising to 1300 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 8. Forecast issued 5:35 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to 700 metres before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:35 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
